pages.text: The Pike is a neutral mob that can be found in Swamps and Rivers.$(br2)There are exit different versions of Pikes: $(li)Amur Pike $(li)Redfin Pickerel $(li)Brown Nothren Pike $(li)Mahogany Northern Pike $(li)Jade Northen Pike $(li)Olive Northen Pike $(li)Spectral Pike $(li)Supercharged Pike.
They will hide in Pickerelweed whick makes them invisible to other fish.

$(li)They will try to hunt other fishs, except Pufferfish or Lionfish.$(br)$(li)On death, if they were holding an item, they will drop it.$(br)$(li)Also they drop Raw Pike, that can be cooked to get Cooked Pike and they may drop Bone Meal too.
$(li)When a Pike catch one Fish, it will carry it on its mouth.
